pages.text: Once you have collected water, you need to purify it.  One method is to place the water vessel into a furance with fuel, which will raise purity levels over time by 2.  You may need to do this more than once to make purified water.

A second method is to place your filled bottle or bowl directly onto a lit campfire.  It will take a few seconds for the water to raise in purity level by 1.  You may need to do this several times to make water purified.
